entry.title: From Start To End
entry.summary:
Author: NeptonicMistakes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 67,642Chapters: 28/?Kudos: 197

Summary: A lot is story with some smut. If you want to read it and not have smut, chapters with it will be labeled and will have no major change to the story (the chapters of smut will just be smut, no extra things)Like the title, it starts at the beginning of Superman and Batman, before they are known to the public, before the robins. Before Bruce and Clark know one another and time goes on.Idk, this is sort of just a ramble and me getting my fixation to write out. entry.title: A Love Story For The Time Being
entry.summary:
Author: ok_this_is_love

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,065Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 88

Summary: Bruce shifts beside him. Clark hears the faint crinkle of foil, the rustle of gloves against packaging as Bruce tears open one of his awful protein bars. The ones that taste like sawdust and regret, packed with just enough nutrients to keep him running on fumes for another few hours.And then--Bruce breaks it in half.Clark barely has time to process before a piece is being shoved into his palm, fingers brushing against his own for the briefest second before Bruce pulls away, like the whole motion is nothing. Like it’s casual.

entry.title: Feverish
entry.summary:
Author: lostinreeverie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,202Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 47

Summary: The sight of Clark lying motionless on his bed stopped Bruce cold. The man looked like death warmed over—pale, drenched in sweat, his breathing shallow and labored. For a split second, Bruce’s heart skipped a beat. The Superman he knew, the symbol of strength and invincibility, was nowhere to be found. In his place was a man—his Clark—utterly vulnerable. Clark’s eyes fluttered open as Bruce rushed to his side, his voice barely a whisper. "Bruce... I think I'm dying." Or, Clark is sick and Bruce takes it upon himself to take care of the man who’s always been there for everyone else.

entry.title: Expectations.
entry.summary:
Author: Karaxuno

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,864Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 51

Summary: “I noticed Robin was new.” Clark says, settling next to him in the monitor room.Bruce hums.“What happened to the first one? He was a good kid.”Rain on gravestones. Doors slamming. Handstands. Laughter in the Batmobile. Screaming. Crying. Leave me al-Bruce clears his throat, pushing those memories down, down, down, “You never met the first Robin.” He says, abruptly pushing up from his chair. -The soulmate AU where Dick and Bruce have each other’s words, and that’s how the Batfamily come together.

entry.title: Forgive Yourself by Letting Yourself Love (and letting yourself be loved)
entry.summary:
Author: aviationisthere

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 81,218Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 736

Summary: When Bruce arrived at the cave, the first thing he heard was yelling. That wasn’t unusual so he didn’t think anything was out of the ordinary. That was until he parked Nightwing’s bike in its spot and he saw his children. He saw his children. They were children. Young children. “What the...” Bruce pulled off the helmet. He got off the bike and set the helmet down before pulling off his cowl. He walked over to the batmobile which his kids were trying to climb out of. “Boys?”•OR just another batfam de-aging au because I love them and I wanted one that had all of my demands so I roped my friend Avian into helping me co-write one!
